}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[https://www.verizonwireless.com/support/smarthub-compatible-devices/ List of SmartHub Compatible Devices]
*Vendor: [[:Category:Verizon|Verizon]]; Model: MBHA10; SKU: MBHA10VWQ {{see also|Technicolor|Foxconn}}
===FCC info=== *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/G95-MGM0110VZN G95-MGM0110VZN] (2017-03-17) :Equipment Name: LTE Router :Trade Name: [[technicolor]] :Model Number: MBHA10 :Product Code: DSLMVZ011GM
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Broadcom]] BCM63139 / ''Sequans'' VZ22Q+ *Z-Wave Hardware Platform: ''Sigma Designs'' SD3503 *Network: 4G LTE (B4/B13) (700/1900 MHz) *Display: 1.45” Color OLED Display w/touch :navigation keys 160x128 pixels (141 ppi) *Battery: Li-Ion removable (BP-MGM0110) :3.7V, 2500mAh, 9.25Wh
==Links of Interest== ===Certifications=== *{{WiFiCert|WFA70406|02/23/2017}} *[https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/2325 ''Verizon SmartHub MBHA10'' - Z-Wave Certified] *[https://certify.alljoyn.org/certified-products/1043-technicolor-smarthome-gateway-mbha10 ''Technicolor SmartHome Gateway'' - AllSeen Alliance Certified] *[https://openconnectivity.org/certified-product/technicolor-smarthome-gateway ''Technicolor SmartHome Gateway'' - Open Connectivity Certified]
===News=== *[http://www.verizon.com/about/news/turn-your-house-verizon-4g-lte-home-smarthub ''Verizon 4G LTE SmartHub'' on '''Verizon'''] ([https://www.verizonwireless.com/support/knowledge-base-211408/ label]) *[http://www.dslreports.com/shownews/Verizons-New-SmartHub-LTE-Router-Brings-Unlimited-Data-Home-139650 ''New Verizon SmartHub LTE Router'' on '''DSLReports'''] *[https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20160104005258/en/Sequans’-Colibri-LTE-Chipset-Platform-Earns-Validation ''Sequans’ Colibri LTE Chipset Platform'' on '''BusinessWire'''] *[http://www.sequans.com/new-verizon-smarthub-smart-home-gateway-powers-homes-4g-lte-sequans/ ''Verizon SmartHub - 4G LTE Smart Home Gateway'' by '''Sequans''']
==See also== *[[Aztech FG7008GR(AC)]] - ''AC2400 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63139 @1GHz ([https://www.aztech.com/images/datasheet_products/FG7008GR(AC)%2520Product%2520Specifications.pdf Aztech Datasheet]) • [https://www.aztech.com/aztech-support/product-support-downloads/aztech-datacom/fg7008gr-ac PPage] :WLAN: [[Quantenna]] (4T4R 802.11ac 5GHz) MU-MIMO ::+ [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 (3T3R 802.11bgn 2.4GHz) :Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 2x USB 3.0 ([http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/product-aztech-fg7008gr spec.]) :[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bofficial%5D-aztech-fg7008gr-ac-ac2400-mu-mimo-gigabit-router-4977176.html ''Aztech FG7008GR'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums]
